feed.title: Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Develop a RAG Solutionâ€”Generate Embeddings Phase
entry.summary: Learn how embeddings work, how to choose an embedding model, and how your embedding model can affect your vector search results.

entry.summary: Learn how to use BMC AMI Cloud to send mainframe data directly to Azure Blob Storage as part of a mainframe modernization migration.

entry.summary: Learn how to design Azure Virtual Desktop for Azure Local to provide a more secure and productive remote desktop experience for users.

entry.title: Azure for AWS professionals
entry.summary: Learn the basics of Microsoft Azure accounts, platform, and services, and key similarities and differences between the AWS and Azure platforms.

entry.title: Best practices in cloud applications
entry.summary: Learn best practices for building reliable, scalable, and secure applications in the cloud. See resources on caching, partitioning, monitoring, and other areas.

entry.summary: Learn about design patterns for building reliable, scalable, secure applications in the cloud by seeing examples based on Microsoft Azure.

entry.summary: Find out how to automate video analysis. Use Computer Vision and Azure Machine Learning to analyze your content.

entry.summary: Learn about what to consider when you design a large language model RAG solution, including each step of the development process and how to evaluate those steps.

entry.summary: Build a scalable solution for batch scoring an Apache Spark classification model on a schedule using Azure Databricks.

entry.summary: Learn about what to consider when you gather test documents and queries. Use this information to test and validate your chunking and prompt-engineering strategies.

entry.summary: Learn how to implement alternative authentication mechanisms for client applications that communicate with Azure OpenAI Service through a gateway.

entry.summary: Learn how to add a gateway in front of multiple Azure OpenAI model deployments or instances.

entry.summary: Explore the benefits, challenges, and best practices for Big Data architectures on Azure. Examine IoT architecture, a specialized subset of big data solutions.

entry.summary: Use Azure Arc to extend Azure Resource Manager capabilities to Windows and Linux machines on any infrastructure.

entry.summary: This article describes approaches for supporting multitenancy in your IoT Hub-based solution.

entry.summary: Create a modern analytics architecture with Azure Databricks, Data Lake Storage, and other Azure services. Unify data, analytics, and AI workloads at any scale.

entry.title: Stromasys Charon-SSP Solaris emulator on Azure VMs
entry.summary: Charon-SSP cross-platform hypervisor emulates legacy Sun SPARC systems on industry standard x86-64 computer systems and VMs.

entry.summary: Perform cross-cluster scaling of on-premises workloads by using Azure Arc, Traffic Manager, or Front Door and then deploy by using Azure Pipelines.

entry.summary: Learn about common approaches to deploy Azure App Service apps across multiple regions for disaster recovery purposes.

entry.summary: Learn how to use the Azure IoT Hub file upload feature to privately upload files to an Azure Storage account that's exposed through a Firewall and custom domain.

entry.summary: Learn how to build on the Azure OpenAI chat baseline architecture to address changes and expectations when you deploy it in an Azure landing zone.

entry.summary: Learn how to use the Application Gateway Ingress Controller (AGIC) with your AKS cluster to expose microservice-based applications to the internet.

entry.summary: Learn about serverless technologies in Azure by walking through an example implementation of a serverless application with Azure Functions.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Chunk enrichment phase
entry.summary: Learn about the importance of augmenting chunks with metadata like title, summary, keywords, entities, and more. Learn common cleaning operations you can perform on chunks that might improve vector matches.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Information retrieval phase
entry.summary: Learn about key decision points when you're configuring a search index. Learn about the various types of search you can perform such as vector, full text, hybrid, and hybrid manual. Finally, learn about breaking queries into subqueries, and why and how to rerank queries.

entry.summary: Learn about evaluating your RAG solution from end to end using key LLM and similarity metrics.

entry.title: Event-driven architecture style
entry.summary: Explore the benefits, challenges, and best practices for event-driven and IoT architectures on Azure.

entry.title: Use an Identity as a Service platform
entry.summary: Learn why it's important to use an identity as a service (IDaaS) platform instead of building or running your own.

entry.title: Choose a data storage technology
entry.summary: Compare big data storage technology options in Azure, including key selection criteria and a capability matrix.

entry.title: Deploy IBM Maximo Application Suite (MAS) on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to run IBM Maximo Application Suite (MAS) on Azure. See guidance for designing and implementing cloud solutions with MAS 8.5 and up that use Azure.

entry.title: SAS on Azure Architecture
entry.summary: Learn how to run SAS analytics products on Azure. See guidelines for designing and implementing cloud solutions for SAS Viya and SAS Grid that use Azure.

entry.title: Deploy IBM Sterling Order Management Software (OMS) on Azure
entry.summary: Run IBM Sterling Order Management Software (OMS) on Azure. Design and implement cloud solutions for Sterling OMS that use Azure.

entry.title: Storage architecture
entry.summary: Get an overview of Azure Storage technologies, guidance offerings, solution ideas, and reference architectures.

entry.title: Use Azure Firewall to help protect an AKS cluster
entry.summary: Deploy an AKS cluster in a hub-and-spoke network topology by using Terraform and Azure DevOps. Help protect inbound and outbound traffic by using Azure Firewall.

entry.title: Multilayered protection for Azure virtual machines
entry.summary: Protect access to Azure VMs through a multilayer approach, using Azure and Entra ID security services. These recommendations align with security principles and best practices, such as defense in depth, least privilege, and zero trust.

entry.title: Azure hybrid options
entry.summary: Learn about Azure hybrid solutions, including alternatives to deploy and host hybrid services on-premises, at the edge, in Azure, and in other clouds.

entry.title: Choose an Azure service for vector search
entry.summary: Learn how to use this information to decide which Azure service for vector search best suits your application.

entry.title: Choose Azure AI image and video processing technology
entry.summary: Learn about vision capabilities of Azure AI services. Learn which service to use for a specific use cases.

entry.title: Choose an Azure speech recognition and generation technology
entry.summary: Learn about Azure's AI speech recognition and generation capabilities such as speech-to-text, and speech translation, and text-to-speech capabilities.

entry.title: Choose an Azure AI targeted language processing technology
entry.summary: Learn about targeted language of Azure AI services. Learn which service to use for a specific use case.

entry.title: Choose an Azure AI services technology
entry.summary: Learn about Azure AI services that you can use in AI applications and data flows. Choose the appropriate service for your use case.

entry.title: Generative AI Ops for Organizations with MLOps Investments
entry.summary: Extend existing MLOps investments to include Generative AI Ops. Learn where you can apply existing investments and where you need to extend those investments.

entry.title: Basic OpenAI End-to-End Chat Reference Architecture
entry.summary: Establish foundational knowledge for how to build and deploy enterprise chat applications by using Azure OpenAI, Azure AI Studio, and Azure App Service.

entry.title: Design a Secure Research Environment for Regulated Data
entry.summary: Learn how to design an architecture on Azure for a regulated environment that allows researchers to access sensitive data.

entry.title: Provide custom authentication to Azure OpenAI Service through a gateway
entry.summary: Learn how to implement alternative authentication mechanisms for client applications that communicate with Azure OpenAI Service through a gateway.

entry.title: Modern data warehouses for small and midsize-sized businesses
entry.summary: Learn how to use Microsoft Fabric, Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Managed Instance, and Data Lake Storage to modernize SMB legacy and on-premises data.

entry.title: Implement Logging and Monitoring for Azure OpenAI Language Models
entry.summary: Implement comprehensive logging and monitoring and enhanced security for Azure OpenAI Service language models.

entry.title: Baseline OpenAI end-to-end chat reference architecture
entry.summary: A baseline reference architecture for a network secured, highly available, and zone-redundant enterprise chat applications with Azure OpenAI, Azure AI Studio, and Azure App Service.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Chunking phase
entry.summary: Learn about the various chunking strategies like boundary based, custom code, and document analysis models. Also learn about how the document structure should influence your chunking strategy.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - LLM end to end evaluation phase
entry.summary: Learn about evaluating your RAG solution from end to end using key LLM and similarity metrics.

entry.title: Develop a RAG Solution - Preparation Phase
entry.summary: Learn about what to consider when you gather test documents and queries. Use this information to test and validate your chunking and prompt-engineering strategies.

entry.title: Video ingestion and object detection on the edge and in the cloud
entry.summary: Learn how to use a mobile robot with a live streaming camera and object detection to implement various use cases.

entry.title: Application platform considerations for mission-critical workloads on Azure
entry.summary: Reference architecture for a workload that is accessed over a public endpoint without additional dependencies to other company resources - App Platform.

entry.title: Use the Application Gateway Ingress Controller with a Multitenant Azure Kubernetes Service Cluster
entry.summary: Learn how to use the Application Gateway Ingress Controller (AGIC) with your AKS cluster to expose microservice-based applications to the internet.

entry.title: Enterprise business intelligence
entry.summary: Learn how to implement a pipeline that moves data from an on-premises data warehouse into Azure Synapse and transforms the data for analysis.

entry.title: Deploy IBM Maximo Application Suite (MAS) on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to run IBM Maximo Application Suite (MAS) on Azure. See guidance for designing and implementing cloud solutions with MAS 8.5 and up that use Azure.

entry.title: Securely managed web applications
entry.summary: Learn about deploying secure applications using the Azure App Service Environment, the Azure Application Gateway service, and Web Application Firewall.

entry.title: Line-of-business application using Azure App Service Environment v3
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy line-of-business applications with an internal App Service Environment v3, while considering networking boundaries, DevOps, management, and more.

entry.title: Build the second layer of defense with Microsoft Defender XDR Solutions
entry.summary: Add additional security to your IT environment by using Microsoft 365 security service in addition to Azure security. This article is part of a series. Now with the information about Sentinel running in the unified portal.

entry.title: Microsoft Sentinel automated responses
entry.summary: Use Microsoft Sentinel playbooks to generate automated responses and deliver intelligent security analytics for enterprises.

entry.title: Integrate Azure and Microsoft Defender XDR security services
entry.summary: Integrate security solutions from Azure and Microsoft 365 to create robust security for your hybrid and cloud IT environments. This article is part of a series.

entry.title: Use Microsoft Sentinel to integrate with Microsoft XDR security components
entry.summary: Integrate Azure monitoring services and Azure security services to provide defense in depth to your IT environment. This article introduces a series of articles.

entry.title: Map threats to your IT environment
entry.summary: Diagram the IT environment of your organization and develop a threat map to plan and build your defensive layer of security. This article is the second in a part of a series.

entry.title: Azure Files Accessed from On-Premises and Secured by AD DS in a Private Network
entry.summary: Learn how to provide on-premises access to Azure Files with security provided by on-premises Windows Server Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS).

entry.summary: Learn about Azure Kubernetes Services (AKS) day-2 operations, such as triage, patching, upgrading, and troubleshooting.

entry.summary: Learn how to create a four stage end-to-end stream processing pipeline in Azure using Azure Databricks.

entry.title: Manage Microsoft 365 Tenant Configuration with Azure DevOps
entry.summary: Learn how to manage Microsoft 365 tenant configuration by using Microsoft365DSC and Azure DevOps.

entry.title: Azure service retry guidance
entry.summary: Learn about the retry mechanism features for many Azure services. Retry mechanisms differ because services have different characteristics and requirements.

entry.title: Gridwich operations for Azure Storage
entry.summary: Learn about the characteristics of the Gridwich Azure Storage Service.

entry.title: Azure App Configuration considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure App Configuration that are useful when working with multitenanted systems, and it provides links to guidance and examples.

entry.title: Azure Key Vault considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Key Vault that are useful when you work with multitenanted systems, and it provides links to guidance for how to use Azure Key Vault in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: BCDR for Azure Data Factory and Azure Synapse Analytics pipelines
entry.summary: See automated and user-managed methods to achieve business continuity and disaster recovery (BCDR) for Data Factory and Azure Synapse pipelines.

entry.title: Secure a data lakehouse on Synapse
entry.summary: Learn how to secure a data lakehouse that's implemented by using Azure Synapse Analytics.

entry.title: Enable real-time sync of MongoDB Atlas data changes to Azure Synapse Analytics
entry.summary: Learn how to keep Azure Synapse Analytics data pools synchronized with operational data changes in MongoDB Atlas.

entry.summary: Conceptualize, architect, build, and deploy an application that uses projects from the CNCF after deployment of AKS.

entry.title: AKS baseline for multiregion clusters
entry.summary: Run Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster in multiple regions to achieve high availability.

entry.title: Use Azure Front Door to secure AKS workloads
entry.summary: Learn how to secure AKS workloads by using end-to-end TLS encryption, Azure Front Door Premium, an Azure Private Link service, and the NGINX ingress controller.

entry.title: Extract text from objects using Power Automate and AI Builder
entry.summary: Use AI Builder and Azure Form Recognizer in a Power Automate workflow to extract text from images, for indexing and retrieval.

entry.title: News feeds with near real-time analytics
entry.summary: Create a pipeline for ingesting and analyzing RSS news feed data using Azure Cosmos DB, Azure AI Services, and other Azure services.

entry.title: Web API implementation
entry.summary: Learn about best practices for implementing a web API and publishing it to make it available to client applications.

entry.title: Choose a stream processing technology
entry.summary: Compare options for real-time message stream processing in Azure, with key selection criteria and a capability matrix.

entry.title: Architectural approaches for AI and ML in multitenant solutions
entry.summary: This article describes approaches to support multitenancy for the artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) components of your solution.

entry.summary: Best practices for implementing access controls as per Requirement 7, 8, and 9 of PCI-DSS 3.2.1.

entry.summary: Best practices for detecting vulnerabilities as per Requirement 5 and 6 of PCI-DSS 3.2.1.

entry.summary: Best practices for monitoring a PCI-DSS 3.2.1 infrastructure as per Requirement 10, and 11.

entry.summary: Best practices for setting up networking as per Requirement 1 and 2 of PCI-DSS 3.2.1.

entry.summary: Learn about architectural recommendations and code assets from the accompanying reference implementation.

entry.summary: Summary of a well-architected design of a PCI-DSS 3.2.1 infrastructure as a tenant on the AKS environment.

entry.summary: Learn how to design a mission-critical workload for Azure Data Factory on Azure landing zones to build robust and efficient data pipelines.

entry.summary: Learn how to design and implement the medallion lakehouse architecture on Azure landing zones by using Azure Data Factory, Azure Databricks, SQL Server, and Power BI.

entry.summary: Learn how to design and implement the medallion lakehouse architecture on Azure landing zones by using Azure Data Factory, Azure Databricks, Azure SQL Server, and Power BI.

entry.title: Citizen AI with Power Platform
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning and Microsoft Power Platform to quickly create a machine learning proof of concept and a production version.

entry.summary: Learn how to choose the right data store classification for Azure workloads. This article describes simple storage solutions and transactional and analytical databases.
